TIME SEGMENT DIAGRAM
MKKtVMOIKt (106
The MICKEY MOUSE CLUB has a definite format to the extent that when
certain types of programs referred to in this booklet appear, they do so
at a specific time during the hour. The diagram below provides a key to
assist teachers in becoming familiar with the over-all programming plan.
